languages.text: {n}Мысленный контакт не требует от вас никаких усилий. Это не коммуникация — ибо столь могущественное существо не способно понять концепцию коммуникации ни с кем, кроме равных себе. Оно просто наделено даром быть понятым и услышанным — столь грандиозен потенциал Его мыслей.{/n}

{n}Mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but Its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand It — so grand is the potential of Its thoughts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мысленный контакт не требует от вас никаких усилий. Это не коммуникация — ибо столь могущественное существо не способно понять концепцию коммуникации ни с кем, кроме равных себе. Оно просто наделено даром быть понятым и услышанным — столь грандиозен потенциал Его мыслей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand it — so grandiose the potential of His thoughts.{/n}

{n}The mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand it — so grandiose the potential of His thoughts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le contact mental s'effectue sans effort. Il ne s'agit pas de communication : un être aussi puissant ne peut concevoir de communiquer qu'avec ses égaux. Il offre simplement à autrui la possibilité de l'entendre et de le comprendre, en partageant le potentiel phénoménal de ses pensées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but Its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand It — so grand is the potential of Its thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le contact mental s'effectue sans effort. Il ne s'agit pas de communication : un être aussi puissant ne peut concevoir de communiquer qu'avec ses égaux. Il offre simplement à autrui la possibilité de l'entendre et de le comprendre, en partageant le potentiel phénoménal de ses pensées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El contacto mental no requiere ningún esfuerzo. No se trata de comunicación, pues un ser tan poderoso solo puede concebir la comunicación con Sus iguales: tan grandiosos son Sus pensamientos que solo cuenta con el don de hacer que otras criaturas lo oigan y lo entiendan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but Its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand It — so grand is the potential of Its thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El contacto mental no requiere ningún esfuerzo. No se trata de comunicación, pues un ser tan poderoso solo puede concebir la comunicación con Sus iguales: tan grandiosos son Sus pensamientos que solo cuenta con el don de hacer que otras criaturas lo oigan y lo entiendan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你们之间心灵的接触毫不费力。不过，这并不是沟通，如此强大的生物只能与祂的同类进行沟通，其他生物的思维根本无法与祂相提并论。祂的思想是如此无边无际，如此伟大，哪怕仅仅是聆听祂的声音，理解祂的思想，便已经是无上的赐福了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but Its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand It — so grand is the potential of Its thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你们之间心灵的接触毫不费力。不过，这并不是沟通，如此强大的生物只能与祂的同类进行沟通，其他生物的思维根本无法与祂相提并论。祂的思想是如此无边无际，如此伟大，哪怕仅仅是聆听祂的声音，理解祂的思想，便已经是无上的赐福了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der mentale Kontakt ist mühelos. Das ist keine Kommunikation. Ein solch mächtiges Wesen kann allein mit Ebenbürtigen kommunizieren. Es trägt schlicht die Gabe in sich, das Gegenüber hören und verstehen zu lassen — so grandios ist das Potenzial seiner Gedanken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but Its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand It — so grand is the potential of Its thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der mentale Kontakt ist mühelos. Das ist keine Kommunikation. Ein solch mächtiges Wesen kann allein mit Ebenbürtigen kommunizieren. Es trägt schlicht die Gabe in sich, das Gegenüber hören und verstehen zu lassen — so grandios ist das Potenzial seiner Gedanken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}精神的な接触は難なく行われる。これはコミュニケーションではない。このような強力な存在は、己と対等な存在以外とのコミュニケーションを理解することはできない。ただ、相手にそれを聞かせ、理解させるという力を持っているだけなのだ。その思考の可能性はあまりにも壮大だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but Its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand It — so grand is the potential of Its thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}精神的な接触は難なく行われる。これはコミュニケーションではない。このような強力な存在は、己と対等な存在以外とのコミュニケーションを理解することはできない。ただ、相手にそれを聞かせ、理解させるという力を持っているだけなのだ。その思考の可能性はあまりにも壮大だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zihinsel bağlantı kolayca sağlanıyor. Bu bir iletişim değil. Bu kadar güçlü varlıklar, denkleri dışında biriyle iletişim kurmayı idrak edemez. Sadece onu duyup anlama hediyesini bağışlarlar. Düşüncelerinin potansiyeli, işte bu kadar engindir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Mental contact is effortless. This is not communication — such a powerful being cannot comprehend communicating with anyone but Its equals. It simply bears the gift of making the other hear and understand It — so grand is the potential of Its thoughts.{/n}
